item.title: Ariana Grande,Social House - boyfriend
item.description:
I’m a motherxuckin’
train wreck
I don’t wanna
be too much
But I don’t wanna
miss your touch
And you don’t seem
to give a xuck
I don’t wanna keep
you waiting
But I do just
what I have to do
And I might not
be the one for you
But you ain’t about
to have no boo
‘Cause I know
we be so complicated

it’s crazy

what I want
But neither
can you

the way we fight

when it comes to you

when the trust low
